problem.markdown: What is the basic definition of a higher order function? ( ) Any generic function. ( ) Functions that are used more often than others. (x) Functions that use functions as inputs and/or outputs. ( ) Functions that take in primitive values (numbers, true/false, etc.) and output a non-primitive type (list, etc.)
problem.p: What is the basic definition of a higher order function?

choicegroup.choice: Functions that are used more often than others.
Functions that use functions as inputs and/or outputs.
Functions that take in primitive values (numbers, true/false, etc.) and output a non-primitive type (list, etc.)
